docs.lead_paragraph: Readers discuss the role of marketing and how best to promote healthy eating.
docs.snippet: Readers discuss the role of marketing and how best to promote healthy eating.

headline.print_headline: Home for the Holidays? Hold the Sugar, Please
headline.main: Home for the Holidays? Hold the Sugar, Please

docs.lead_paragraph: Bagged or boxed, brown or powdered, Americans are buying markedly less sugar this year, a trend nowhere more noticeable than during the holidays when home-baking picks up.
docs.snippet: Bagged or boxed, brown or powdered, Americans are buying markedly less sugar this year, a trend nowhere more noticeable than during the holidays when home-baking picks up.

headline.print_headline: A Mediterranean Island Without the Famous Diet
headline.main: On a Mediterranean Island, but Far From a Mediterranean Diet

docs.abstract: Valletta Journal; Malta faces unique obesity crisis in Mediterranean region otherwise famous for diet that produces health and longevity; changing ecosystem, higher cost of traditional diet and increasingly sedentary society are cited as possible causes; government of archipelago, which imports over 90 percent of its food, is trying range of measures to counter problem.
docs.lead_paragraph: On Malta, a tiny island between Italy and Libya where apples can cost more than stuffed pastries called pastizzi, residents are now the most overweight in the European Union.
docs.snippet: On Malta, a tiny island between Italy and Libya where apples can cost more than stuffed pastries called pastizzi, residents are now the most overweight in the European Union.
